entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
